author: Snazzy Labs
description:
Can you upgrade an iPad Pro’s Tandem OLED display from glossy to Nano-Texture? Surprisingly, yes! And Apple will even sell you the parts to do it!

Follow Snazzy Labs on Twitter - https://twitter.com/snazzylabs  
Follow me on Bluesky - https://snazzy.fm/UW
Follow me on Threads - https://snazzy.fm/XV
Follow me on Mastodon - https://snazzy.fm/NN
Follow me on Instagram - https://instagram.com/snazzyq

In this video, I attempt the ultimate iPad Pro upgrade by replacing the default glossy screen with Apple’s nano-texture matte display using the official Self Service Repair program. Watch as I navigate Apple’s complicated repair process, tackle the massive toolkit rental, and reveal the real risks and costs of DIY iPad Pro screen replacement. If you’re curious about iPad repairability, Apple Self Service Repair store, or want to see a hands-on screen swap, this is the video for you! Discover whether upgrading your iPad Pro display to nano-texture is worth it and what Apple doesn’t tell you
title: I Used Apple’s Self Service Repair to Upgrade My iPad Pro—Here’s What Happened
